content.detailedDescription:
I was video-taping at random and caught this object.  it appears to become visible just beyond a large cloud.  it comes through and around the cloud, then comes toward the camera.  it goes out of camera range and comes back, then goes back to the cloud.

all this happens in less than 2 seconds.  video attached.
content.summary: Black object resembling a bat or insect zipping and zig-zagging from cloud to camera and back

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were visiting my brother, sister-in-law, neice and nephew in broward county - (southwest ranches); and, as we were preparing to leave we were standing outside in the driveway talking and star-gazing. my brother is an amature astronomer, my nephew is studying aeronautical engineering, my neice is an attorney, my sister-in-law is a nurse, and i am a professional local government employee.

we were star-gazing and discussing the various constellations and stars, when my nephew stated that he saw something in the western sky that was very odd. we all saw what appeared to be a triangular shaped object with silver/white lights flying from south to north. it was a clear, near cloudless sky with a bright moon, so visibility was clear. 

at first i thought it was a flock of birds flying in a "v" formation and the moonlight was reflecting off of them. but then i saw a single white light blink one time, in what would be the rear center of the object. as it was going away from us to the north, it appeared to change trajectory as if it was turning or banking to one side (to its right), so that the lights then appeared to align in a straight line. there was no red or green lights. it was not an airplane or a helicopter. there was no sound. 

it is very difficult to estimate the height, but i would guesstimate it was about one-half mile high. the entire event only lasted about one minute+. my elderly mother was the only one that did not witness this event due to her poor eye-sight.

my sister-in-law and neice dismissed it as a military "flying wing", but my brother and nephew (who both fly small planes) are very knowledgable about various models of airplanes, and they said it was the wrong configuration to be the currently known flying-wing. 

it was an amazing event and we were all pretty stunned. i drew out what i witnesssed tonight, and just called my nephew to get his immediate recollection as it was still fresh in all our minds.  he did not recall seeing the single light at the rear of the object, that i saw; but, we all concur it was a triangular shaped object - and it must have been solid, as we could see no stars between the triangular shaped lights.
content.summary: Observed a triangular object flying from south to north in the western sky, single white light at center of triangular bottom, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
(this information entered by mufon field investigator who learned of witness while interviewing other witnesses to recent obol events in region.)

a woman and her daughter were driving home in kokomo at 7:30pm when they both noticed an orange ball of light (obol) flash on, then off seconds later while stopped at an intersection. as they were turning and discussing the obol, a second one appeared and performed the same on-again, off-again performance - illuminated for just a few seconds before going dark.  the woman judged the size of the obol to be at least a quarter held at arm's length.  as they drove home, they witnessed another obol illuminate near or over their neighborhood.  the woman called her husband who was at home to see if he could see the obol.  altho he looked, he did not see it, and waited as his family arrived moments later. then, together - they kept watch on the skies overhead.  minutes later, another obol appeared - this time to the far west - exhibiting the same characteristics but more distantly.  moments after it "went out" another obol appeared through their tree line down lower to the horizon before winking out.  they became concerned and frightened and went inside their home.  later, the woman recalled going back outside and verbally asking the obol to reappear to no avail.  she did notice several small planes which appeared to be circling the area  of sky where the obol display had been earlier.  the planes all departed the area within an hour of their arrival.  despite her fear, she was excited and wanted to see more of the phenomenon.  the witnesses described the obol as stationary, not moving laterally or vertically, and only illuminating for a few seconds apiece.  they also spoke with friends about their sighting and learned two friends in different locations had also seen the obol, one of those witnesses actually videotaping the display.  the video witness was described as being frightened and nervous about what he saw and taped, and extremely hesitant about sharing his information. their other friend who saw the event described what he saw and believed to be flares from aircraft.  

(the mufon field investigator has requested the original witness contact her friend with the videotape and try to get a copy of it for the investigation. awaiting further developments in this case.)
content.summary: Multiple obols witnessed by family in northcentral in

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in los alamos, nm playing with a sony super nightshot camera in the early morning in my front yard and saw this dancing like display in the viewfinder.  i looked without using the camera and it was not visible.  i knew immediately that it was something very unusual when it just kept happening and i could just follow it around the clouds with the camera. i realized the star-like objects making these trails were quite obviously above the clouds and it was about then that i just knew it was a ufo.  i couldn't believe the first thing i recorded with my new camera was a ufo.  i freaked out and my first comment was me talking like a sailor and then my heart started really hurting and i prayed for my heart but i could not stop looking.  finally i was hurting so bad and they weren't doing anything new and i was truly hurting bad enough to scare me so i stopped filming. i have back problems too and the combined pain just stopped me.  i know that sounds crazy right now (it does to me too) but i was scared that i might even have a heart attack because it really rocked my world and my heart really hurt and i needed to get away from it.  it almost seemed like it was hurting me directly.  i know it wasn't but in a way it was...  i also know this stuff happens everyday now so its not that special but now i know its real and this was different than what i've seen because the dancing was in the clouds and well defined and easy to see in the video.  i recorded about 2 minutes worth of video of about 3 star-like objects dancing (i mean it seemed like dancing) and leaving long well defined tails in every frame. they would fade in and out behind clouds.  they looked a little like a laser when you twiddle it to get a pattern but they showed up in clear and cloudy sky and faded behind the clouds.  it is a very clear video and its obvious that it is not camera movement because of the clouds in the picture.  since i couldn't see them without the camera i think they must be infra-red light but i didn't think to turn off the nightshot feature.  i was using manual focus at infinity and they are well defined.  i tried to zoom in more but they seemed to fade and so i zoomed back a little.  i was at a pretty good zoom level but i don't know how much. i sure would like some guidance on what the right thing is to do now and i am honestly still quite shaken by this event.  it was so unreal that i almost expected to see nothing on the video but there it is clear as day.  if its some new airplane its unreal because it can make a bunch of big fast turns in one frame of video.  i have much more video than i shared below but i used some sailor talk and then prayed for my heart so i don't want to share the rest without cutting the sound out.
content.summary: Stars (about 3) that left trails in almost every frame and faded behind clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my wife's parents in gilbert.  at around 2am on sept. 15, 2005 there were four of us in the backyard.  my brother in law tapped me on the shoulder and pointed northeast.  i turned and saw a bright spherical object approximately 1/2 mile away from our location in the subdivision.  looked to be not more than 1000 feet overhead.  the light emitted was almost blinding and pulsed into three different colors (red, yellow, and pale blue)  i thought it was either a police or military helicopter with its searchlight on given our proximity to williams gateway airport.  that thought faded as i listened and heard just a faint humming sound.  all four of us kept our eyes fixed on it while i signalled my father in law to get his binoculars.  i could not even look at the object being it was so bright.  the whole thing was covered in light---it basically glowed totally.  we watched it for about 10 minutes just remaining in that one position.  it was gone almost instantly.  the light looked like it just shut off and the faint humming sound was gone.
content.summary: Standing in backyard with 4 family members we looked northeast and saw a bright, round object hovering approx. 1/2 mile away

content.detailedDescription:
I forgot to add that there is story and video as well

http://www.Myfoxtampabay.Com/myfox/pages/news/detail?Contentid=6033132&version=2&locale=en-us&layoutcode=tsty&pageid=3.2.1
content.summary: Tampa triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I thought i would submit this because i'm in the same area where this event happened.

ufo captured on tape in pasco  
 
last edited: friday, 14 mar 2008, 3:22 pm edt  
created: friday, 14 mar 2008, 3:18 pm edt  
 
the ufo featured three white lights and a blinking red light.  we've got you covered

wesley chapel - an unidentified flying object caught the attention of some pasco county residents early friday.

many described the object -- a rotating triangle of three white lights plus a flashing red light that stayed put -- as a ufo.

the pasco county sheriff's office says some wesley chapel residents called 911 around 6:25 a.M. wondering what was up -- literally.

a deputy's report says it was a balloon, but doesn't get more specific than that.

watch the video attached to this story and decide for yourself.
content.summary: Triangle ufo over tampa florida

content.detailedDescription: i was outback of my house on the porch facing northeast. when a flicker of orange and red light-sphere began to grow and pulsate from midair. i watched it for about 15 minutes. i know it was not the moon, it was already visible when this sphere appeared and it was much larger than anything else, besides the moon, i have ever seen in the sky. it grew to about the size of nickel at arms length, about half-mile from my house. the reds and oranges swirrled together like a lava lamp, i think it was rotating but with the colors moving i could not tell. looking at it i became afraid or aware that it was not of this world or dimension. i got the feeling that something was looking back at me. i stepped out of my screen porch to try and make more sense of this thing, and when i did a small sphere detached itself from the main sphere, about a quarter of its size. it detached itself like two water drops would seperate. once that happened i was more afraid because i dont know if they really were watching me, i went back on to the screen porch and continued to watch. the main sphere began to shrink or dim out, while the smaller one began unknowm course south. eventually both spheres where not visible after 15 minutes. i do not know if this is related but i experienced sleep paralysis that night or what i believe, an attempted abduction. everyone else says i had a bad dream, i am no dummy, the paranormal and the human psyche amaze me. the first thing i due is try to disprove the event with rational explanation. i couldn't find anything to explain my paralysis and the fear that cosumed me when i felt a chalky hand grab me from behind. unable to move, scream,and protect yourself. thats all i remember, i dont think i was abducted but then again with hypnosis that could change.
content.summary: Hovered, red and orange, not moon it was also visible.

content.detailedDescription: Took several photos in sequence of sky over jobsite. when uploaded to pc i discovered that there was more than one.  i don't know what inspires me to take the pictures i just get a feeling and there they are.  i have several from last year on my site at fdinwidy7.Tripod.Com and i am seeing alot of activity starting already this year over our area.  also if don braffit reads this i had a really weird experience while sleeping three days before.  i awoke in bed and was on my side and i could not move and didn't want to move because i had a pulsating wave going through my body from head to toe but mainly along my spine.  it was as if i was floating but i know i was on the bed because i had my eyes open...Too strange i know and i cannot say i've ever had an abduction experience so i won't say this is one but it was strange. also i am seeing the craft with my own eyes sometimes rather than just random photo's of the sky.
content.summary: Took several photos in sequence of sky over jobsite.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my new panasonic  hdd camcorder looking at the moon, it was just the outer crest and then i noticed a bright star like object in the sky just to my right ( south )i recorded it for about 15 minutes on and off and then i realized it had not moved but the moon was moving west. i was about to go inside when for some reason i said let me just see if it does anything before i go in and as i was filming at about 7:40 i saw it just blur through the lcd screen and as i looked up with my naked eyes i just could not see it anymore. the object is in the same spot the entire time i am the one shaking and zooming in.
content.summary: I saw a star like object at 7 15 pm march 11 and it was stationary for 30 mintutes and then it just changed. i cant explaine it

content.detailedDescription:
It was friday, march 1st 2008 when i decided to go outside around 1 in the morning. it was very cold out and i had been cooking a breakfast/dinner type deal. for some reason, i decided to go outside and pee, depsite the freezing temperature. while looking west, i'd noticed a star shimmering in the sky and changing multiple colors--not the usual red and blue. this caught my eye and i ran inside and got my brother from the shower. he came outside and, through the binoculars, we could distinctly see an object, not a star, not a planet, changing colors. we decided to get closer so we jumped in his car and drove about five miles north on highway 441. we reached an rv park and began filming with my jvc high definition camcorder. the camera was not steady on a tripod but i got it on film changing colors and such. we decided to go home and see if it was in the same position. it wasn't. we could no longer see the object. the duration of this was about fifteen minutes. the next night i looked outside at the same time in the same position, and it was no longer there. 

now, three days later, march 3rd: my brother, myself and two others were going to the gym. we had been talking about the ufo video. my brother, r, decides to check the sky once more and, alas, the light in the sky further south, towards a very large lake in my area called lake apopka. it is the third largest lake in the state. we jump in my car and drive to the lake where we get out, with the camera and binoculars, and see the light hovering over a city known as clermont. it was sitting well below the light pollution line and seemed to be about ten miles away. it very faintly disappeared. we caught it on film. then, behind us, we see two lights, appearing out of nowhere, hovering north of the lake, about ten-fifteen miles away. i get out my camera and film the pulsation lights as they sit there, not moving. my dad is an airline pilot, so my brother and i know what a plane looks like. it sat in the same spot for over three minutes before silently, changing from two lights to three, moves across the lake to the east. it disappeared behind trees. we sat there for some time and another pulsating light appeared in the east, directly above the tree line.
we filmed it as well. after about twenty minutes we decided to leave where we met up with a few friends at my house. they all left and it was my brother who, after getting a distinct "euphoric" (as he describes it) feeling, telling him to go to the lake. we jump in the car with the camera and binoculars. we call our friend j (who witnessed the lights with us earlier inthe night.) he tells us to come to his house where there is a light that has been hovering towards the south. we arrive at his place and see the light... except now it is west, sitting just above the treelines. i grab my camera, binoculars and tripod and set up. i get the light on film. now here's what scares us the most. from what we saw, the light moved across the sky right to left, before disappearing beyond the trees. what was caught on film was the light merely dipping out of the sky. there is so much more i would prefer to talk to a person directly. all four of us who witnessed the event are skeptics, and this is a life changing thing. i am most likely going to call the mufon number to speak directly to a person. i believe i might have definitive evidence ufos exist. at least i hope so. our feelings during th event were mixed. we were all very excited and euphoric and felt very special to be touched by such an event. when i saw the lights move in the sky, despite it not being on camera (i believe the aliens tampered with the evidence) i knew, in my soul, that ufos are real. please, any help or advice you can offer would be great! i'm willing to provide more information and answer any questions you might have. please email or call me anytime.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Saw craft, several lights, all on film.

content.detailedDescription:
Having just purchased a new canon powershot a650 is digital camera, i stepped outside at work to photograph the moon and skywatch for ufo's.
yes, i actively search for ufo's (have had several sightings)- and within 5 minutes of stepping out, i spotted an obect in the distance. i had to switch to video mode before i pointed my camera to locate the object on the screen. i lost precious seconds - seconds when the object was traveling in the clear. i started shooting as soon as i saw the object on the screen.I zoomed in at the maximum optical zoom of 6x. it traveled clear skies for a few seconds before entering the clouds where it disappeared and reappeared about three times at cloud breaks.
the event date is 03/13/2008. the time was 1854 (6:54 pm)
please watch the attached video. if you have any comments or questions feel free to email me at unleashed_texan_1946@ahoo.Com.
thank you.

note:
my location was: 37 deg 24'37.29n - 121 deg 54'49.42w. i was looking east.
the object appears to have three sections,compartments, or elements. not sure what to make of it in regards to the overall shape and structure. all comments welcomed.
content.summary: Camera-ready, actively searching skies for ufo's -spotted one within 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: i felt drawn outside around 4pm on 2/28/08 (thursday. i was looking at a few jets spewing out chemtrails when i noticed a silvery football shapped orb(w/no exhaust nor features). it was a very clear, blue bird sky with the exception of the chemtrails. i yelled for my girlfriend to come outside and she spotted it also. we both agreed it looked more like an oval, football shape with a silvery luminosity that stood out in contrast compared to the chemtrail jets that were close to it. at one point in the beggining, i thought the object was going to crash into or near miss a chem trail jet as they approached each other from opposite directions. i caught one good photo with my digital binoculars as it faded into the distance.
content.summary: Day light ovel object over 1 mile above location - no interaction.

content.detailedDescription:
On fri, mar 14, 2008 at 2:12 am, ameet asrani <ameet31@gmail.Com> wrote:

    hello there
              at 11:45 pm i was looking outside my balcony and saw at a distance a red flashing object looked more like a star from far i looked at it constantly for 10 minutes and then realized the light was getting bigger like the object was coming closer.It was red and yellow flashes.After another 10 minutes i saw it moving very slowly from north east direction to north west direction and lights got smaller and went sideways.The ufo was stable for 30 minutes at its position.I then went down and found couple of people down and showed them the light.They were also suprised as they had not seen something like this before none of us had a camera a video cam.I then came back back up to appartment.At 11:50 am i contacted the ufo reporting centre in washington and filed a report there.At 1:22 am the object has moved north west and the lights went smaller and smaller and sideways stopping every 2 mintues in one position until it went pretty further away for me to see it .If you want the image of this object my best suggestion would be to take satellite photos at the precise time i saw this.You might able to pull some images.This is my first encounter with something like this and will never forget this day and sighting for the rest of my life.You can contact me at 647 989 6110 my name is ameet asrani.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo sighting march 13th 11:45pm

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of the circle k inside my camero.  it drifted over me at treetop level making no sound. it was black. it had a few dim lights on its edges. it was outside my field of vision within 10 seconds.
content.summary: I was in front of circle k inside my camero.  it flew over me at treetop level making no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi. i was hesitant to report this, as i am very religious and wanted to believe i saw something other than what i did. however, for your research purposes, here was my encounter.

my husband and i were just leaving a dunkin donuts drive-thru in bristol at 1:10am. we were talking about how rude the drive-thru worker was, when i looked up and commented on how cloudy it was. my husband loves astronomy and we look at the sky often to observe. anyhow, i was looking up, just east over the town skyline, when i saw a oval shaped, pewter blue colored hovering object. i did a double take, as it seemed to appear out of nowhere, and tried to discredit it as the moon. however, that theory got shot down when the moon made an appearance right next to it, under the overcast clouds. it was hovering low, seemingly just above the town, but high enough so the neighboring town of southington should have been able to see it. i thought i saw lights on the bottom of it, but am not sure as i had my husband speed up, not slow down, and we had minimal glare from the street lamps. i rolled down my window and stuck my head out so that i could see it better. i could clearly see it, sans the lights. it seemed like it was trying to blend in with the clouds, and almost looked transparent in nature. if it wasn't for the fact that it was actually a shade lighter than the clouds, and the moon near it illuminated it, i don't think i would have even noticed it.

the ufo was there for about 2 minutes as we drove. it seemed to be moving as we were at that point, because we sped up, but it was still alongside the car. i became fearful and told my husband to step on it. when i looked back a second later, the object was gone, there was only the light of the moon. 

i wanted to see it again, even though i was scared. so as soon as we got home i went looking for it. however, i did not see it again. after wrestling with the idea for 20 minutes, i called the local police to report the incident to them. interestingly enough, the officer told me that he had heard nothing of this nature being reported prior to my calling, but he knew the exact location where i saw it without me telling him. it's also important to note that he did not seem to find a bit of this comical, on the contrary; he sounded quite shaken.

this was my first sighting, and it was truly like nothing i had ever seen in my life. i will never forget it, nor will i forget that we are truly not alone.

please contact me with any questions. i apologize, we do not have pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Ufo sighted over town skyline while driving home early morning

content.detailedDescription:
Me gustaria compartir mi historia con ustedes porque pienso que talves pueden entenderme y darme un explicacion ,acerca de lo que me sucedio el 15 de julio  del 2005. un tiempo despues me vine a estados unidos.
pero antes , quiero remontarme haci mi nines, en donde recuerdo haber tenido un avistamiento , a la edad como de 5 anos.
en ese tiempo , solia vivir con mi familia en un sona mediana mente rural,en donde no habia muchas construciones,y el bano no esta muy cerca de lo que era la casa.
haci que tenia que caminar un poco ,para poder llegar a donde esta el bano, entonces  mire al cielo y vi una formacion triangular/no tengo mucho detalle de como eran los objetos , pero depues de esto empece a tener suenos extranos. cuando cerraba los ojos miraba luces de todos colorez.
el peor momento del dia era cuando llegaba la hora de dormir. porque esas imagenes se hacian grandes y pequenas en mi mente.Por ejemplo: si pensaba en una flor, esta flor se hacia grande y despues pequena,y tenia movimientos hondulantes.Y todo se movia.Con el tiempo todo esto paso,y ya no me pasaban esos suceso que me ocurrian cuando era nino/
despues el suceso mas facinante que me ocurrio fue en la casa de un tio ,donde estuve de vacaciones muchos meses. en la misma cuidad donde vivi siempre, en tucuman , argentina.
todo fue planeado, prepare todo para que esto sucediera,claro que nunca me imagine que fuera tan rapido.La idea surguio de un programa de television donde un grupo de personas ,todos de bolivia , se internaban en el bosque, o cerros.Equipados con reflectores o linternas con mucho potencia, para haci hacer senales luminosas haci el cielo, y esperar una respuesta de los llamados  "fufaiter"( cosa que no sucedio).Teme  la idea de ellos.
yo tenia una linterna de mediano tamano , en realidad no era ni siquiera grande .Apenas alumbraba unos 60 metros .
tome una silla , y me fui a sentar en el patio de atras de la casa.Ya  estaba oscureciendo, y la noche esta imensamente clara ,pasadas las 8.30 pm  el dia ya estaba acabando ,y era la hora preciza para empezar , a lo que yo considera  "que nunca  iba a pasar".
entonces ya estando en mi lugar , me dispuse a encender mi linterna, la prendia 5 veces y la apagaba. y haci continua mente por unas dos o tres ves.
de pronto unos 3 o cuantro minutos despues , aparecio un luz pequena ,que despues supe que le decian "fufaiter" la primera impresion fue quedar sorprendido. no tuve miedo.Esta luz se quedo dando vuelta por lo menos unos diez minutos.Y despues  desaparecio de mi vista .[en los dias siguientes hice exactamente lo mismo y el resultado fue igual , una pequena luz aparecia , daba unas vueltas y despues se iba. esto sucedio por lo menos , desde que comense hasta unas dos semanas despues.Apartir de eso ,y por un periodo de casi un meses , no pude ver nada.
aunque estas luces , en el periodo de dos semanas que pude verlas , siempre fueron muy puntales. aparecian de 8pm a 8.30pm./
cuando yo pense que eso no iba a funcionar ,y que estaba perdiendo mi tiempo. volvieron a parecer ,pero esta ves no era un solo"fufaiter" si no eran como 10,  no lo podia creer , ya que el dia no era propicio ,porque estaba nublado y parecia que esta por llover. lo que  me llamo la atencion es que siempre fue a la misma hora, de 8pm a 8.30/
yo estaba emocionado por lo que me estaba pasando y lo que estaba viendo, pero a la ves tenia miedo de que algo me pasara.
no queria que algo me apareciera , creo que no lo soportaria.
pero lo mas emocionante todavia no habia ocurrido,de pronto entremedio de la luces que estaba mirado, aparecio un triangulo ,que les puedo jurar que paso raspandome la cabeza.
solo lo vi pasar en cuestion de unos segundo , yo creo como 5 talves,no mas de esos.
pero si pude notar que era transparente y tenia unos puntos en el medio.
creo que tenia un color como blu.
he hizo uno sonido , como cuando el viento sopla entre los arboles.
un sonido suave.
cuando paso todo esto, quede sorprendido, emocionado.
despues tuve algo de miedo,mas adelante pense que estaba teniendo alucinaciones y nada de lo que paso era real. empece a negarmelo a mi mismo.
aunque esa etapa ya paso. es la primera ves que cuento esta historia en publico.
no me gustaria que me tomen por una persona , "loca" por eso nunca le conte  a personas allegadas a mi.
aunque en los sucesos que yo mismo he vivido no tengo pruebas fisicas o material propio para poner en este foro.Tengo otras puebas que encontre investigando en "google earth"buscando  detalle por detalle.Encontre lo que prodria ser una base alienigena, que esta situada en el polo sur.
pero que puedan llegar a una conclusion.
por mi parte tengo muchas teorias,pero es mejor dejar en manos de expertos.
solo son algunas de las decenas de fotos que podria mandar.,pero que pueda investigar.
content.summary: Tranquilo.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to bed aprox. 11:50 and was having one of those in and out of sleep moments. currently there is no covering on our bedroom window because we are renovating. 
i noticed light sort of fill the room and thought it could be car lights but  seems how our bedroom is on the 2nd floor it was unusually bright to be a car. it took me a couple seconds to focus and realize there was an extremely  bright object in the sky and at this moment i can not remember if it was moving or not. i just had to really look at this thing and find a category for it.
i looked away and back at it to see if it was still there and then to try and comprehend what it was doing, it moved fast and slow which makes absolutely no sense and i had a hard time determining how close or far it was. it was a bright orange oval moving gradually across the sky and then behind  a large group of trees on the property across the street from me and when it passed behind the trees i thought it must be close. what amazed me the most was the brilliant glow i witnessed through these trees, it was then i decided to look at the clock to document the time 12:28a.M. it sort of had a tail but not really this is why i checked the off the teardrop above cause it had that effect but it was moving across the horizon.
 the tail would shrink and grow as it moved kind of distorting the whole shape, i still cannot identify with the way it moved and the only thing i could possibly relate it to is a comet, but i looked them up on the internet and i couldnt find anything similar, i did find a few related pictures on some ufo sites.
as for the way i felt, i was very aware of my feelings because i am a spiritual person and i didnt have any fear i was just awestruck.
afterward i laid in bed and tried to think of anything else it could be besides a ufo....But i couldnt.
content.summary: It was bright orange and white it moved in a way that felt close but far at the same time.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 0120 et on mar 14 a slightly less intensity than a street light, but about the same size, yellow to white spectrum light appeared in the sky about 4 city blocks away.  it quickly continued straight down, or away, for a duration shorter than 3 seconds (approx) and appeared to "burn out" as an ember would from a bbq fire.  it was a straight line.

conditions are cloudy, overcast, with "fuzzy sky" but clear near the surface.  

initial thoughts: thought for a moment it was a low flying plane...
after thoughts: perhaps it was a meteor...

conclusion: reported to substantiate any additional reports only.  not enough information alone...

location: mccowan & hwy 401 in scarborough (community within toronto) ontario canada.  viewed from 23rd floor of apt building to the ne of the apparent "light source".
content.summary: Firework or flare residue

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside smoking a cigarette, facing northwest, on a clear day with only a few wispy clouds.  i routinely watch the skies. never know what i'll see.  today i noticed a bright deep-orange object almost drifting from ssw to nne across my line of vision.   at first, i thought i was seeing an inflated advertising balloon/blimp that had come untethered and was escaping.  there was only a slight breeze on the ground, less than 5 mph probably, and the few scattered clouds were not visibly moving at all.  this orange object did not drift upward, as an escaping balloon might.  it moved steadily in a horizontal nne direction, at about 75-80 degrees above the horizon.   i got a pair of (inexpensive) binoculars and with them the object appeared to be a bright orange cube, slowly rotating on one point of the cube, with black semicircular areas at the two corners of the cube, which were the leading edge and trailing edges of the cube, given the direction of travel.  these semicircles were large, deep black, and pulsated on and off at regular intervals.  it made no sound, had no visible means of propulsion, and was moving slowly and steadily.  i cannot estimate the height or size of the object very well.  it was at approximately 75-80 degrees above the horizon, and could have been any distance out from me; i extended my arm/thumb, and the object appeared about 1/2 the size of my thumbnail.   

when first seen, the object was to my right, in a line of sight with the sky over nellis air force base.  my next thought that the object originated at the base, but its line of movement was from over the city, not the base--hence the escaped balloon theory.  the nellis jets routinely fly over my house when returning to land at the base; this object was traveling in the opposite direction, and no other aircraft were immediately visible.   

then, from my left, a small, one-propeller airplane came from the nnw, approaching nellis at a fairliy low altitude, as if on landing approach.  it was white, with red strips, which i'm told are nellis planes; they are seen frequently here.  i'm also told that the air space in my neighborhood is restricted to air force traffic, that commercial aircraft from mccarran field and from a smaller, private airport in north las vegas do not use the airspace.  very infrequently, when winds are bad, some commercial outbound flights from mccarran are routed just south of us, but they always follow a specific path and are easily distinguished from nellis jets by their speed, markings, and light configurations.   

the small airplane i observed was lower than the ufo, and did not deviate from its flightpath.  the orange object continued slowly nne, then stopped, then started forward again.  no other craft were in the sky by that time.  the black pulsing half moons were still operating.  the object paused a second time, the black halfmoons switched off, and then the craft shot straight up; no sound, tremendous speed.  i searched the sky with the field glasses, but no sign of it anywhere.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange object moved slowly from south-southwest to north-northeast, stopped, then disappeared straight up at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Around july 11th 2005 my sister and i were driving back from our mothers house. we were on st. rt. 703 about 4-5 miles out from our home . we started up the hill toward the college and noticed this large object coming over the hill at the same time. we suddenly stopped and said to each other check the clock. as soon as we said that i looked at the clock and it was a little after 1 am. the object stopped directly above us.No more than 50 ft above us. it was oddly shapped. shapped like a triangle with a point coming down from the center. the front glass window was clearly visable. it had 3 rectangle glasses and in the background you could see a light board. kinda like a wall full of little flashing lights. i seen a shape but wasnt clear enough to see what it was. it was human form but larger head. the object stayed above us for approximately 15 minutes before it just left as quick as it came.It was like there was noone else around but us and the object. we seemed to be the only people on the earth at that time and that was a frightening. we immediatly went home and called the police department and asked if there was a report of an stelths in the area. the replyed no. from there we just sat there shivering in fear and wondering what it was we saw. to this day i still know what i saw and i know for a fact it was a ufo . not sure what it was doing over us or what it wanted but i am still frightened when the thought comes up. i dont have a picture of this object all i have is memories but i will one day take my memories and put them to paper.
content.summary: On this night my sister and i both witnessed this ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my friends house.  it was approximately 7:45 pm.  (i was hurrying to get home so i could watch american idol, so i am real sure about the time.)  a flash of orange light caught my eye.  it was off to the left of my car.  i was traveling north on county road 350 east in howard county, between st rd 26 and center road.  this was a dark stretch of road that had empty fields on either side of it.  when i saw the flash of orange, i immediately saw two bright orange balls of light, low in the sky.  in relationship to the horizon, one was at about 30 degrees the other about 40 degrees.  the were about two inches (when i hold my hand up and measure with my fingers) apart.  they were about the size of a large pea at arms length.  i pulled over to the side of the road to watch them for a moment. i at first thought they must be some kind of light plane with some really crazy landing lights or something.  i rolled the window down and heard nothing..  not a sound and they were close enough to me that if they had a motor i would have heard it.   then, they started moving and i knew right away that there was no way this was a plane.  it was obviously two separate craft and they were moving very strangely.  they kinda "danced" around each other.  one bobbed up and the other bobbed down..  then they both vanished in thin air!  i sat there for a minute trying to absorb what i had just seen.. the light had a kind of sparkly glow about it that seemed unnatural.  i felt very uneasy and as soon as they disappeared, i though, "damn!  what just happened?!"  i check my clock for missing time but all was normal there.  i raced home and excitedly found my husband when i got in the door, to tell him what i had seen..  i felt all tingly for about an hour after that i i felt very nervous!  paranoid almost..  like something was watching..  i had a real hard time falling asleep.

then, today, i am at my massage therapist and the first thing she says to me is, you are not going to believe what i saw the other day.  i looked at her kinda funny and said, wait, don't tell me..  2 orange balls of light in the sky?  she about fell over.  yes, she said, but not just 2.  she saw 4 and her timing was a little later than mine.  she saw hers about 15-25 minutes after mine, but they were in the same western direction..  i am sure she would be glad to verify this is you want.
content.summary: Looked to west and saw two bright orange balls of light dancing in the sky at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i,my best friend and his girl were driving through tuolumne county when i noticed an orb in the sky.At first you could see thru it like a bubble.It looked as if something was on the dash,reflecting on the windshield,i rolled down my window & put my head out to be sure it wasnt a reflection and about that time it changed to a milky white and you could no longer see through it.All 4 of us saw it.It seemed to zero in on us at which time i became very scared and pulled my car to the side of the road,turned off the lights and engine.My heart was pounding as it moved in closer,and it hovered above us for several minutes,moved left and right at very high rates of speed,probably thousands of mph? then did what to me looked like the nucleur symbol and shot stright up and out of sight at high speed.I had never seen or heard of the orbs until i told a close friend and she had a ufo book which showed many pictures of the ones like i saw.Also i saw the movie poltergeist and at first it did look like those bubbles coming down the stairway.So i have never been sure if it was extraterrestrial or spiritual.Also,ironically 7 hours later my best friends girl accidentally fell to her death,she was with us of course when we saw it,so i was never sure if there was a connection there or not.I have only told a select few people ever about this for fear of ridicule,etc. but let me say that anytime i hear naysayers on t.V. trying to explain away things seen in the sky i say to myself,"this guy has obviously never saw a ufo because if he saw what i saw he would know for sure they exist,without a doubt!" i am a normal,average kinda guy,definitely not some wierdo,well educated,rational thinking person,and clearly saw this object in the sky,unobstructed.  thank you for letting me tell my account,timothy w. hoelzel,jr.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Clearly observed a white orb in sky it "zeroed in" on us then shot strait up and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Looked outside and saw two objects go over my house. so low it could have landed, a small object followed. it was like a disk, with a red and white light underneath. the red light was blinking. i heard no sounds until it went over and i watched out the front of my house, it was still tree top level. it was like looking at two ships playing tag with eachother. the sound was loud whoosing sound. i followed it for about 3 to 5 minutes. my cats were acting really strange i was really excited. i didn't sleep until after the event. i was up for several hours.
content.summary: Saw two object go over my house. a larger with white lights, and a small one with red and white underneath. blinking.

content.detailedDescription: Looked outside and saw two objects go over my house. so low it could have landed, a small object followed. it was like a disk, with a red and white light underneath. the red light was blinking. i heard no sounds until it went over and i watched out the front of my house, it was still tree top level. it was like looking at two ships playing tag with eachother. the sound was loud whoosing sound. i followed it for about 3 to 5 minutes. my cats were acting really strange i was really excited. i didn't sleep until after the event. i was up for several hours.
content.summary: Saw two object go over my house. a larger with white lights, and a small one with red and white underneath. blinking.

content.detailedDescription:
A thin white object was seen hovering near boca raton.  a starlike dull 
yellow object like a "shooting star" passed around the first object in and 
out, up, down, hovering,fading and brightening then underneath the thin object.It faded and brightened.  the thin object was brighter on one side than the other as though a light was going back and forth on its right side.   

mary margaret zimmer fl asd, fi
content.summary: White line with starlike object going around it.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happened so many years ago but i remember it quite vividly.  i was walking with a friend on a lake (egg lake in hugo, mn) in the early evening on our way to her house.  my house was on the lake and we would walk that way to her house in the winter when the lake was frozen.  we were only a few houses away from mine when a older neighbor friend saw us and came down to the lake to see what we where doing.  it was already dark and some would say it was not safe to be out on the lake alone that late.
we just stood there talking for a bit.  i happened to notice how clear the night sky was and pointed it out to my friends.  then i noticed 3 extremely bright "stars".  at first i was a bit baffled because they seemed way to close to the earth for them to be stars.  i pointed them out to my friends and thought they looked like the "3 wise men ".  they only appeared to be about as high as the clouds would be so we just kept watching them trying to figure it out.
the 3 "star like" objects were much bigger than a star in the sky.  they were lined up horizontally and were evenly spaced apart.  all of a sudden the 2 on the outside started moving back and forth very slowly.  i couldn't believe what we were seeing.  we just stood there (kind of in shock) asking each other if they were seeing the same thing.  slowly the objects moved faster and faster.  if my memory serves, i believe the middle light dimmed during this time.  finally, in a blink of an eye all 3 object seemed to shoot straight up and basically disappear.  before disappearing the objects were moving so fast back and forth it was like nothing a plane or helicopter could do.   
we were so scared that we all took off running.  we talked of this incident many times and still couldn't believe what we had witnessed that night.
content.summary: 3 star like objects appeared in the sky. evenly spaced horizontally. they were stationary then 2 on the outside moved back & forth getting faster until 3 disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work around 2am in the morning, my husband was following me in his truck, i was alone in my car. i was headed south on 28th street north in st. petersburg. it was a clear evening. slightly cool. my husbands truck was older and i had a honda accord at the time and i was driving way ahead of him. as i was getting closer to my left hand turn onto 34th street no, i noticed straight ahead of me something hoovering over the railroad tracks that was circular, very quite, steel looking greyish disk with a slight bump on the top 1/4 the size of the rest of the object. it was just there. it did not move and it really was something to see... it seemed hugh spanning the length of the road and just hoovering over the tracks. i stopped my car, rubbed my eyes and said out loud, that really is there. i am not dreaming this, (i looked into my rearview mirror hoping to see another car, maybe my husbands truck, anyone else),i am driving,i am not sleeping. what is that? then a bit of fear came over me as to why i was the only one on that road and this thing was here alone in front of me, as if i had caught it before it could leave? i slowly opened my door after maybe 2 minutes just staring at it,very still in the middle of the road, a slight light was around the center. very faint light, very odd! as i stood there standing next to my car, door open but holding on to the car, without even a sound or a whisp of air it switched to its side! in a nanosecond. in a blink! wow i thought! now i was very afraid looking at it i started to get back in my car and then without a sound or even a whisp of air it took off it seemed like instantaniously in the night sky. in a blink! now it was off in a far distance and just stopped dead in its tracks. i turned to look behind me again for my husbands truck, he was still no where in sight and neither was anybody else. i watched the disk in the air hoovering there around 2 more minutes, then it seperated instantly into a ball of flaming fire, the ball exited the disk on the left side, it was amazing!!!!! the ball of fire was orangeish and the same size as the disk. now i had the disk on the right and the ball of flame on the left. they just stayed that way for a minute or so and then shot off into the way beyond my sight range. it all happened with absolutely no sound at all. i stood alone for a few minutes in the street next to the car. wondering what i had just seen. as i stood there a minute longer wishing it was still there i heard the truck turn the far corner onto 28th street behind me. my husband came up behind me and asked me what i was doing standing alone in the middle of the street. i said i had just seen a ufo or something and was very shaken and i needed to go see my mom right now to talk about it. he laughed at me and said i think you need to get home and get to bed. i asked him if he believed me, he said well you obviously had something happen to you, but a ufo??? i started to cry and said i wanted to see my mother right now because she has known me all my life and she knows i would never make up a story about this. so i turned my car around and went to my mothers home, she was only 10 blocks from where this happened, it was now around 2:45 in the am. i approached her home rang her doorbell and asked her to please put the coffee on, because i had an emergency and needed to talk to her immmediately. she said o.K. and let me in and put that pot of coffee on and listened to my eyewitness version of what had happened and agreed that i was not out of my mind. she said she had also seen things on her houseboat in the middle of the night she could not explain. she said it was best not to share these things as most people will label you nut's and i would be the brunt of peoples jokes. so i took her advise and never have really spoken about it until now. i am absolutely sane and very sure of this testimony. i hope by sharing this, this helps validate other peoples sightings. when something like this happens to you it is hard to deal with yourself, i cannot explain why this happened to me, let alone worry about how others will percieve me.  teri lynge
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It appeared flat, then flipped on it's side, then took off , then seperated

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving to go to work as a turned on the main street i saw something on the right hand side of the passenger window,i looked again and noticed that it was quit weard,it kind of scared me i pulled to the center of the island on the road and got out to look at it,it looked like a huge circle of murcury just floating in the sky i looked at some cars driving by and felt like i was looking kind of stupid as i got back in my car turned it around cause i wanted to go home and get my camera it went away....When i got to work i told my friend kirk and he started laughing but then realized that i wasent joking,i also told my wife i called her from a payphone at work and she believed me,till this day i have no fkn clue what it was but i know one thing for sure it was not a plane a baloon or a blimp,i mean ive looked at mercury before and thats what this looked like in the air.I am a trae believer and am sick and tired of the government not having the balls to tell the world what is really going on,

thank you 

moe
content.summary: It looked like mercury in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
At 9pm i let my dog out into the garden, whilst waiting for him i was looking around at sky over the north sea & noticed a star that looked as though it was being moved around by the strong winds. it was going up & down & side to side. i then called my husband out & he saw the same thing.
i also saw this star last sept. what is it? iknow our winds cant affect stars. i couldnt sleep thinking about it & got up at 4am & it was still there.
content.summary: A star shape that looked like it was being moved around by our strong winds
